    • Method Detail

      • extendUpwards

        public void extendUpwards(java.awt.Component component,
                          int finalHeight,
                          int delay,
                          int stepSize)
        Extend the specified component by moving the upper edge of the component. Please note that the component should be on null layout.

        Parameters:
        component - A Component that should be moved.
        finalHeight - int final height of the component.
        delay - int delay in milliseconds between two steps of the movement.
        stepSize - int no of pixels that the component should move within one step.

      • narrowDownwards

        public void narrowDownwards(java.awt.Component component,
                            int finalHeight,
                            int delay,
                            int stepSize)
        Collapse the specified component by moving the upper edge of the component. Please note that the component should be on null layout.

        Parameters:
        component - A Component that should be moved.
        finalHeight - int final height of the component.
        delay - int delay in milliseconds between two steps of the movement.
        stepSize - int no of pixels that the component should move within one step.
